title: Does the word ‘interesting’ sound interesting to you? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not particularly, But I am interested in why you would find it interesting that I would find the word interesting, interesting. interestingly.
No, not really but then intriguing doesn’t sound intriguing. There are many words that do engender their meaning though - hot, cold, hungry, bored …. Perhaps it’s peculiar to the individual?
